mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report_board (report_id, title, content, writer_id, writer_name, writer_pw, status, assigned, file_original_name, file_saved_name, file_mime_type, file_size, reg, email) VALUES (report_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content, jdbcType=CLOB}, #{writer_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writer_Name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writer_Pw, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assigned, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{file_Original_Name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{file_Saved_Name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{file_Mime_Type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{file_Size, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SYSDATE, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from (select b.*, rownum r from(select * from report_board order by report_id desc) b ) where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end}
